message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your operations or personal use. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at $15000. This is a special introductory price, and I'm confident it will provide a significant return on investment for you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was hoping to get a better deal. Considering the product's features and my budget, I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. I believe this is a fair price, considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to me.
